title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Development for Online Graduate Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific theories and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for establishing and implementing self-regulated learning plans in blended environments.
Learners can apply practical strategies to monitor and adjust their learning outcomes using smartphone-based tools
Learners can evaluate their self-regulated learning competencies and propose improvement plans through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
